name: dot-pattern
description: A background dot pattern made with SVGs, fully customizable using Tailwind CSS.

props.name: width
props.description: Horizontal spacing between dots in pixels

props.name: height
props.description: Vertical spacing between dots in pixels

props.name: x
props.description: Horizontal offset of the entire pattern

props.name: y
props.description: Vertical offset of the entire pattern

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS classes for the SVG container

props.name: glow
props.description: Whether dots should have a glowing animation effect
